Object Parameters: Delay until the first block spawns (time in frames)
Delay between block spawns (time in frames)
Number of Blocks/Item Boxes that can exist at any one time
Description:
{{obj-ref|Press}}, ''block.brres'' and {{obj-ref|itembox}} combination from Toad's Factory.
Each block follows a route until it reach the press and the press converts it to an item box which continues the route.
Route Point Settings: Action (1 to press, 2 to determine where item box goes):
